bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of BCGM 艾 massive wind disease with white papules on the skin. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ai 艾 quotes Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 : 白癩風瘡，干艾隨多少，以浸曲釀酒如常法，日飲之，覺 痹即瘥 , “[To treat] white repudiation-illness wind sores , take an appropriate amount of dried ai , soak [in water], add yeast and prepare a wine the usual way. [Have the patient] drink this everyday until a feeling of numbness sets in. This is the cure”.
